summary: This document is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering August 8-9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual, etc.) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a detailed operational snapshot of the facility during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there. This is a daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details officer post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for various units including SHU (Special Housing Unit), control posts, and visitation. The document shows frequent staff changes and reassignments, reflecting operational management at the facility.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 8-9, 2019.
The roster details posts like CAPTAIN, OPS LT, SHU (Special Housing Unit) officers, and various security and escort positions.
It tracks staff statuses including Sick Leave, Annual Leave, Day Off, and official time designations.
The document provides an operational view of the facility's staffing during a period when Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate.
Only two individual staff members, Thomas, M and Noel, T, are explicitly named; other references are to posts or initials.
